message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  It's a good deal for you, considering the inflation!
Let's split it fairly, 60/40 is a reasonable offer considering I'm losing value each round
Bob, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I'm still losing value with each round. 80/20 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
Come on Alice, 55/45 is more than fair considering I'm losing 21% of value now. Don't be greedy!
Bob, we're both losing value here. Let's get this done.  70/30 is my final offer.  It's the fairest we can do with the inflation.
